About Us

DjangoBerry
The technical traning curriculum, found at the "Skyroom" located in Köln, Germany & hosted by Studitemps

Mostly about Django

Learn the most popular of the python frameworks.
(*please note, may contain traces of flask, pyramid and others)

Agile Team Management

You are a great developer and should also know how to run a team of other great developers.

Technical Scalability

Features

A more detailed look at what DjangoBerry offers

Easy setup

Log-in with facebook, enter the name of your Page put up your signage.

Theme selection

Pick from a growing selection of stylish content themes.

Theme customisation

Dont like the font or colour? Customize until you are happy.

Automatic Content to Layout assignment

Our advanced algorithms select the display template that best suits your content.

Realtime Updates

No need to manually update the list, we communicate with facebook and update your playlists automatically.

Playlists & Scheduling

Playlists dynamically select and assign content, based on customisable filters.

Plug & Play Media Player™

Simple installation of the DjangoBerry
(like Glastonbury but with more geeks) Player™. Can be accessorised witha variety of expansions such as: motion detection, cameras, interactive surfaces

Ad-network

Assign a selection of your best content to become part of our ad-network and expand your products reach.

Weather, Time & News

By default, select your news source

And much more!
